featured.text: The purpose of this passage is to (A) explain how people become bilingual.
According to the passage, which of the following is TRUE for bilingual people? (A) Those who spoke different languages used the same part of Wernicke’s area.
He used an instrument called an MRI (magnetic resonance imaging) to study the brains of two groups of bilingual people.

definition.zh_def: 雙語的；能使用兩種語言的。
definition.en_def: Able to speak two languages fluently.
definition.example: She is bilingual and can easily switch between English and Spanish.
